title: Person found shot to death in Altgeld Gardens
content:
A person was found shot to death early Sunday in Altgeld Gardens on the Far South Side.
About 2:20 a.m., responding officers found the person with multiple gunshot wounds in the 700 block of East 133rd Street, Chicago police said.
He was pronounced dead at the scene, police said. His name hasn’t been released yet.
No one was in custody.
excerpt: About 2:20 a.m. Sunday, responding officers found the person with multiple gunshot wounds in the 700 block of East 133rd Street.
summary: A person was found shot to death early Sunday in Altgeld Gardens on the Far South Side . He was pronounced dead at the scene, police said . His name hasn't been released yet . No one was in custody, police say . The person had multiple gunshot wounds
